actions: Treats sores, skin ulcerations and carbuncles and reduces swelling topically.

contraindications: Untreated Ban Xia is toxic and should never be taken internally.

notes: Grind the herb coarsely, add the sugar and mix with a small amount of cold water to form a paste. Apply to the wart with a sterile bandage and affix with skin tape. Avoid wetting the area. Reapply every three days until the wart drops off.
